summary: SummaryHighlightsVeganFeel fresh with AHAVA's Refreshing Cleansing Gel that washes away dirt, impurities, and makeup residue without drying the skin. Infused with their exclusive skin activator, Osmoter, a signature blend of hydrating Dead Sea minerals, and Ginger root extract for perfectly clean and supple skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsGentle soapless cleansing gel to clean and refresh the skinWashes off makeup, dirt and impuritiesTones and refreshesDoes not dry the skinSLS/SLES FreeParaben freeSuitable for all skin typesKey IngredientsOsmoter™ stimulates natural, own-to-skin production of hyaluronic acid, collagen, and other compounds and ensures your skin’s health, strength & youthful appearance.Ginger Root Extract, Gingko Biloba, Ginseng Extracts (Toning)Vitamin E (Antioxidant)Dead Sea Minerals (Hydrating)Allantoin (Soothing)Item 2634775How To UseMassage the gel on damp face, avoiding eye area. Rinse off with lukewarm water.IngredientsAqua (Mineral Spring Water), Ammonium Lauryl Sulfate, Zinc Coceth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Maris Aqua (Dead Sea Water/Osmoter), Allantoin, Tocopheryl (Vitamin E) Acetate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Zingiber Officinale (Ginger) Root Extract, Ginkgo Biloba Leaf Extract, Panax Ginseng Root Extract, Phenoxyethanol, Hydroxypropyl Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Glycerin, Potassium Sorbate, Lactic Acid, Parfum (Fragrance), Linalool, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Benzoate.
how_to_use: Massage the gel on damp face, avoiding eye area. Rinse off with lukewarm water.
